item.description:
Baseball Cards of Rhode Island
6861 Post Road
North Kingstown, RI
02852


From the Vault Relics: EDH Tournament
When: Saturday, November 13th, 12 noon
Entry fee: $10
Format: Elder Dragon Highlander (modified ban list and rules; see below), Swiss 1v1 rounds followed by top 4-man multiplayer pod
Prizes: 1st place ? FTV: Relics, sealed
2nd - 4th places will draft from the following:

1x Tolarian Academy
1x Gaea's Cradle
1x Wasteland

These prizes are based on 12 people entering, and may change according to drastically lower (or higher) turnout.

If you do not know the rules of Elder Dragon Highlander, please see this site, keeping in mind that there are modifications to the rules for this tournament: http://www.dragonhigh...

Due to length restrictions for idea posts, the rules modifications for this tournament are posted here: http://forums.mtgsalv...
item.name: BBRI - North Kingstown, RI - Elder Dragon Highlander Tournament for FTV: Relics!
